snippet: The director of a film on the pilgrimage to Mecca says it has remained a spiritual place despite modern trappings.
lead_paragraph: The director of a film on the pilgrimage to Mecca says it has remained a spiritual place despite modern trappings.

headline.main: Pilgrims in Modern Mecca: A Test of Faith
headline.print_headline: Pilgrims in Modern Mecca: A Test of Faith
